1.question: Mrs. Hilt bought a hot dog for $1.75 and a bag of chips for 75 cents. Her sister bought 2 hot dogs and 2 bags of chips. How much more money did Mrs. Hilt's sister spend?

4.question: Mrs. Hilt impressed 2,436 fans at the basketball game on Friday. If the fans were seated in equal groups on 3 sets of bleachers, how many fans were on each set?

6.question: Mrs. Hilt needs to be at work by 9:00 AM. It takes her 10 minutes to shovel her car out of the snow, 25 minutes to prepare for the day, and 35 minutes to drive to work. What time should she wake up so she can get to work on time?
